schema.title: Automation Module Type Definitions
schema.description: This schema is used for verification of JSON objects used for creation of Automation Object Templates.

triggers.title: Trigger Templates
triggers.description: Container for Trigger Templates used to create the Trigger Modules of the Rule.

[A-Za-z0-9]+.title: Trigger Module Type
[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: Definition of the Trigger Module Type.

label.title: Trigger Label
label.description: Short(one word) user friendly description of the Trigger Module Type.

description.title: Trigger Designation
description.description: A brief description of what the Trigger is and for what it is used.

config.title: Trigger Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Trigger. Contains objects describing Configuration Properties.

[A-Za-z0-9]+.title: Configuration Property
[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: Property for configuring Rule or Module.

type.title: Configuration Parameter Type
type.description: Property declaring data type of the Configuration Parameter.

label.title: Configuration Parameter Label
label.description: A human understandable label of the Configuration Parameter.

description.title: Configuration Parameter Description
description.description: A human understandable description of the Configuration Parameter.

required.title: Required Configuration Parameter
required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.

min.title: Configuration Parameter Minimum Allowed Value
min.description: Minimum value of numeric types, minimal length for strings, minimal number selected options.

max.title: Configuration Parameter Maximum Allowed Value
max.description: Maximum value of numeric types, maximal length for strings, maximal number selected options.

step.title: Configuration Parameter Step
step.description: A constant value for increasing/decreasing numeric types

pattern.title: Configuration Parameter Pattern
pattern.description: Regular script for subscribing text types.

readOnly.title: Readable Configuration Parameter
readOnly.description: Specifies whether the value is read-only.

multiple.title: Multiple Configuration Parameter
multiple.description: Specifies whether multiple selections of options are allowed.

context.title: Configuration Parameter Context
context.description: Serves to determine how to treat the value of the Configuration Parameter.

defaultValue.title: Configuration Parameter Default Value
defaultValue.description: Declaring a default value for the Configuration Parameter if missing.

value.title: Configuration Parameter Value
value.description: Declaring a value for the Configuration Parameter in case of system context.

filterCriteria.title: Configuration Parameter Filter
filterCriteria.description: Criteria for dynamic selection of values.

options.title: Configuration Parameter Options
options.description: List of definitions of the parameter for static selection.

output.title: Trigger Output
output.description: Output object of the Trigger used to transfer data to other modules of the Rule.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class.

tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

conditions.title: Condition Templates
conditions.description: Container for Condition Templates used to create the Condition Modules of the Rule.

description.title: Condition Designation

config.title: Condition Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Condition. Contains objects describing Configuration Properties.

[A-Za-z0-9]+.title: Configuration Property
[A-Za-z0-9]+.description: Property for configuring Rule or Module.

actions.title: Action Templates

composite.title: Composite Module Types
composite.description: Contains definitions of the Composite Module Types.

oneOf.title: Composite Trigger Module Type
oneOf.description: Contains definition of the Composite Trigger Module Type.

tags.title: Composition Module Type Tags
tags.description: Non-hierarchical keywords or terms describing the Composition Module Type. They help to classify the templates and allow them to be found.

config.title: Composition Module Type Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Composition Module Type. Contains objects describing Configuration Properties.

triggers.title: Trigger Modules
triggers.description: Contains definitions of the Trigger Modules of the Trigger Composition.

items.title: Trigger Module
items.description: Defines the fact which triggers the Rule execution.

id.title: Trigger uid
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

type.title: Trigger Module Type
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Trigger Composition. Must be unique in scope of concrete Rule definition.

config.title: Trigger Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Trigger Composition. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.

output.title: Trigger Output
output.description: Output object of the Trigger used to transfer data to other modules of the Rule.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class.

tags.description: Shows how to be considered a given value. For example, as a Temperature.

oneOf.description: Contains definition of the Composite Action Module Type.

actions.title: Action Modules
actions.description: Contains definitions of Action Modules of the Action Composition.

items.title: Action Module
items.description: Defines an action which has to be executed by the Rule.

id.title: Action Id
id.description: Identifies uniquely the Module in scope of the Rule.

type.title: Action Module Type
type.description: Identifies the Module Type used for creation of the Action. Must be unique in scope of concrete Rule definition.

config.title: Action Configurations
config.description: Used to configure the Action. Contains pairs of Configuration Property's name and its value.

input.title: Action Input
input.description: Contains pairs of Input name and Output reference in format - ModuleID : OutputName.

output.title: Action Output
output.description: Contains pairs of Output name and Output reference. The reference defines what part of a complex data has to be used as value of this output.

input.title: Action Input
input.description: Input object of the Action used for binding an Output objects of other modules in order to receive data.

type.description: Fully qualified name of Java class.

required.title: Required Input
required.description: Specifies whether the value is required.

defaultValue.title: Input Default Value
defaultValue.description: Specifies the value if the Input is not required and is missing.
